attribute.name: type
attribute.text: Type of candidate for coreference resolution (CHUNK/ENAMEX)

attribute.name: label
attribute.text: Label of candidate for coreference resolution (NP/LOC-ORG-etc)

attribute.name: sentenceid
attribute.text: ID of the sentence markable the candidate belongs to

attribute.name: lemmata
attribute.text: Lemmata of the candidate token constituents

attribute.name: capitalization
attribute.text: Capitalization of the candidate token constituents

attribute.name: pos
attribute.text: PoS of the candidate token constituents

attribute.name: isprenominal
attribute.text: Whether the coreference resolution candidate is a prenominal modifier

attribute.name: semrole
attribute.text: The semantic role of the coreference resolution candidate
